thread.title: House Passes Sexual-Harassment Revamp

author: Natalie Andrews
title: House Passes Sexual-Harassment Revamp
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The House of Representatives voted Tuesday to overhaul its policies on sexual harassment, banning lawmakers from using taxpayer funds to pay for settlements and mandating public reporting of cases.
The measures, which passed unanimously, would mark a major shift in how sexual-harassment claims are handled in the Capitol. The legislation, which lawmakers say was written with input from victims of sexual harassment, grants subpoena power to the office investigating allegations and requires it to release a biannual...
